name: Multi-Step Email and Calendar Test
description: Sample flow to test multi-step orchestration - checks calendar, gets weather, and creates summary

config.instruction: Check the calendar for {{date}} and provide a summary of scheduled events. If no real calendar access, simulate with 2-3 sample meetings.
Get current weather information for today. If no real weather access, simulate with sample weather data for a business day.

Create a comprehensive daily brief combining the calendar summary ({{calendarSummary}}) and weather information ({{weatherInfo}}). Format it as a professional email to {{recipient}}. Include recommendations based on the schedule and weather.
